original_text: And when they came to the threshing floor of Nacon, Uzzah put out his hand to the ark of God and took hold of it, for the oxen stumbled.
korean_text: 그들이 나곤의 타작 마당에 이르러서는 소들이 뛰므로 웃사가 손을 들어 하나님의 궤를 붙들었더니

sentences.original_text: And when they came to the threshing floor of Nacon,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나곤의 타작 마당에 이르렀을 때,

sentences.original_text: Uzzah put out his hand to the ark of God
